_source.short_desc:
One platform. Every process.
Turn all your processes into applications with Bizagi's low-code process automation platform.
_source.long_desc: Bizagi's industry-leading platform for low-code process automation connects people, applications, robots, and information. As the most business-friendly and flexible solution on the market, Bizagi enables true collaboration between business and IT, delivering faster adoption and success. Fuelled by a community of 1 million users, Bizagi powers over 1,000 organizations worldwide including Adidas, BAE Systems, and Old Mutual. For more information visit www.bizagi.com
_source.target_audience: Enterprise cloud Platform-as-a-Service for intelligent process automation and empowering citizen developers to create low-code process applications.

category_features.name: Access Controls/Permissions
category_features.definition: Define levels of authorization for access to specific files/folders

category_features.name: Business Process Automation
category_features.definition: Improve the management of information, tasks, and procedures by establishing routines and patterns associated with processes

category_features.name: Business Process Control
category_features.definition: Define and maintain business rules that determine workflow capabilities and criteria

category_features.name: Collaboration Tools
category_features.definition: Ability to work collectively on a project while communicating and sharing information within the system in real time

category_features.name: No-Code
category_features.definition: Drag and drop/visual interfaces that allow non-tech users to build without writing code

category_features.name: Process Change Tracking
category_features.definition: Document any changes or proposed changes made to business processes or workflows

category_features.name: Process Modeling & Designing
category_features.definition: Visually identify, define, and map all details and relationships surrounding business process models and elements

category_features.name: Process Modeling & Designing
category_features.definition: Visual tools to allow users to design business process models with a focus on developing improvements for optimized processes

category_features.name: Templates
category_features.definition: Sample files or documents that could be customized as needed or used as is

related_products.short_desc: A visual collaboration tool that creates a shared perspective for your team on any project in a fun, flexible, and rewarding way.
related_products.features: From sales and marketing to HR and operations, teams can design and customize Trello to fit their unique needs and work styles. And with over 100+ integrations with other key tools like Google Drive, Slack, Jira and more, Trello is a living, breathing project hub of cross-team collaboration no matter where your work needs to happen. Trello brings joy to teamwork by making it transparent and easily shareable across boards and teams.

related_products.short_desc: With 15+ years in the agile space, Jira offers teams the top tools and best practices to provide the right foundation for growth.
related_products.features: Jira is the #1 software development tool used by agile teams. Teams of 2 to 20,000 rely on Jira to manage every stage of their workflow, from planning to shipping and releasing. With native roadmaps, teams can ladder up their work to track the big picture. Jira's no-code automation engine allows teams to save time and increase power by automating any task or process with a few clicks. And with a free edition, teams up to ten users can leverage all the power of Jira at no cost, forever.

related_products.short_desc: With 15+ years in the agile space, Jira offers teams the top tools and best practices to provide the right foundation for growth.
related_products.features: Jira is the #1 software development tool used by agile teams. Teams of 2 to 20,000 rely on Jira to manage every stage of their workflow, from planning to shipping and releasing. With native roadmaps, teams can ladder up their work to track the big picture. Jira's no-code automation engine allows teams to save time and increase power by automating any task or process with a few clicks. And with a free edition, teams up to ten users can leverage all the power of Jira at no cost, forever.

related_products.short_desc: Asana is the easiest way to organize and manage all of your team's work. See why 9,000+ customers give Asana 4.5 out of 5 stars.
related_products.features: Asana is a business process management tool that helps teams orchestrate their work, from daily tasks to strategic initiatives. With Asana, you can connect all your work in one place and bring teams together, anywhere. From lists to boards, to calendars and gantt charts, organize work your way. Join more than 114,000 paying organizations and millions of teams across 190 countries who use Asana to get more done. Get started in minutes to try Asana.

related_products.short_desc: ClickUp is the future of work - it's one app to replace them all. ClickUp is the #1 fastest growing productivity app in 2022.
related_products.features:
ClickUp is an all-in-one productivity platform that eliminates work silos. It's the hub where teams come together to plan, organize, and collaborate on work using tasks, Docs, Chat, Goals, Whiteboards, and more. 

Easily customized with just a few clicks, ClickUp helps teams of all types and sizes deliver work more effectively. By replacing inflexible and overlapping tools, ClickUp helps teams save one day each week!

related_products.short_desc: monday.com is an intuitive platform that allows you to create unique solutions for all aspects of your business in one place.
related_products.features: monday.com is an intuitive platform that allows you to create unique solutions for all aspects of your business in one place. Start with pre-made templates and fully customize them for your workflows. So your entire team can track inventory, onboard new employees, oversee projects, update statuses on important tasks, and manage your sales and marketing campaigns. Get rid of painfully long email threads and cut down on meetings while getting even more done with this collaborative solution.

related_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
related_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

related_products.short_desc: Confluence makes it easier for your organization to deploy, optimize, and effectively organize your company's most complex strategies.
related_products.features: When executing on any project, having processes in place makes you more effective. Use Confluence to get these processes setup. Confluence is a Business Process Management software tool that can make it easier for your organization to deploy, optimize, and effectively organize your company's most complex strategies. Confluence seamlessly integrates with Atlassian suite products such as Jira to help you automate your processes.

related_products.short_desc: Microsoft Visio is a diagramming solution that helps visualize data-connected business process flows, empower remote teamwork, and more
related_products.features: Microsoft Visio is a diagramming solution with a robust library of templates and shapes, data connectivity capabilities, and integrated collaboration tools to empower remote workers and teams anywhere. Create impactful visualizations using provided shapes and starter files.  Edit diagrams stored online simultaneously with colleagues through a web browser to work with others anywhere securely and effortlessly. Even connect diagrams to real-time data to make decisions quickly.

related_products.short_desc: Founded in 2011, Zapier has helped over 1.8 million individuals and businesses with their automation needs.
related_products.features:
Zapier helps SMBs easily automate work without writing any code. Build custom workflows fast for more than 4,000+ web apps, and let Zapier handle repetitive tasks automatically-freeing your team up to focus on more important work. 

Zapier integrates with more tools than anyone, helping you streamline processes and making all your systems more efficient. And for larger teams, Zapier offers collaboration and security features that let you unlock the power of automation for your entire organizatio

related_products.short_desc: Wrike is an enterprise business process management software with templates, time tracking, Gantt charts, dashboards, reports, and more.
related_products.features: Wrike is a business process management software trusted by 20,000+ companies worldwide. Create a streamlined digital workplace using custom request forms, Kanban boards, Gantt charts, time tracking, real-time updates, and performance reports all in one place that can be shared company-wide. Integrate Wrike with 400+ applications to automate your everyday processes. Customize workflows and reduce the need for emails, meetings, status updates, and more. Work smarter, not harder with Wrike.

similar_products.short_desc: monday.com is an intuitive platform that allows you to create unique solutions for all aspects of your business in one place.
similar_products.features: monday.com is an intuitive platform that allows you to create unique solutions for all aspects of your business in one place. So your entire team can track inventory, onboard new employees, oversee projects, update statuses on important tasks, and manage your sales and marketing campaigns. similar_products.short_desc: FlowWright is the #1 BPM/Workflow software for automating and integrating processes and systems.  Built on Microsoft technology stack.
similar_products.features: FlowWright is the #1 BPM/Workflow software for companies looking to automate and integrate their business processes.  FlowWright is the fastest and most robust BPM software available and includes graphical workflow, rules engine, forms, message bus, business object support, full multi-tenant support, and rest and .NET APIs.  FlowWright is built on the Microsoft technology stack and can be deployed both in the cloud or on-premise.  FlowWright is known for outstanding support and responsiveness.

similar_products.short_desc: airSlate is a no-code workflow automation platform offering a genuinely intuitive toolkit for businesses and citizen developers.
similar_products.features: airSlate is the first and only holistic no-code document workflow automation platform. It combines e-signing, contract negotiation, document generation, no-code robotic process automation and web forms into a single business automation platform. Configure and automate any business process and integrate it into multiple systems of record without writing a single line of code.

similar_products.short_desc: The #1 Cloud Financial Management System that simplifies business processes and automates manual tasks, driving efficiency at scale.
similar_products.features: Sage Intacct propels your business forward with advanced functionality that delivers unprecedented levels of sophistication and automation to business processes management. Streamline business processes, using workflows for routing, approvals, and distributions. Simplify how your business operates, reduce friction, and improve efficiency. Prepare for the future with a flexible and scalable financial platform that arms you with trusted insights to transform your business and power growth.

similar_products.short_desc: Enterprise Process Center? is a centralized repository that stores and manages processes with a unique data-driven approach.
similar_products.features: At the core of Enterprise Process Center? is a centralized repository that stores and manages processes and related data within a user-friendly, intuitive environment. You can link together complex artifacts of an enterprise: objectives, processes, procedures, employees, departments, customers, suppliers, systems, policies, documents, rules, risks, controls, capabilities and KPIs and tie them all together as puzzle pieces forming a 360 degree blueprint of the organization's architecture.

similar_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
similar_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

similar_products.short_desc: ActiveBatch simplifies Workload Automation and Enterprise Job Scheduling by unifying disparate business processes enterprise wide.
similar_products.features: ActiveBatch centralizes control over repetitive processes for dynamic, enterprise-wide task orchestration and visibility. Automate processes like onboarding, file transfers, resource planning, report generation and delivery, data transformations, and more. A powerful, high-performance console interface supports workflow development and environment administration, while intuitive, business-friendly interfaces empower end-users with self-service access to run and report on workflows.

similar_products.short_desc: Enterprise workload automation and job scheduling. JAMS automates critical batch jobs on multiple platforms and applications.
similar_products.features: End-to-end workload automation and job scheduling software for the enterprise. Schedule, monitor, and manage critical cross-platform workloads from a centralized solution. Automate smarter using triggers, dependencies, and sophisticated workflow logic. Manage jobs through a desktop or web client, or through APIs. Eliminate manual processes and deliver superior service levels in all areas of enterprise IT.

similar_products.short_desc: TrackVia helps anyone to turn business processes into apps that automate tasks, streamline work, centralize data, and reduce costs.
similar_products.features: TrackVia is the most-trusted way for IT and business people to rapidly build web and mobile apps to automate and streamline any process, no matter the industry. Build an app with drag-and-drop ease or add code to conduct work on any device, in any location, even when offline. Integrate apps with clicks into any system or BPM software to centralize data for real-time visibility and improved productivity. Get the complete data picture, make better decisions, and move work with speed and accuracy.

similar_products.short_desc: Insanely Simple Process Automation: get access to the power of bots, APIs, RPA, and real human Wrkers in one easy-to-use platform.
similar_products.features:
The Wrk platform automates your labour-intensive processes with simple Automated Wrkflows, delivering top-quality results with none of the headaches. 

Wrk is the only automation platform on the market to combine bots, APIs, RPA, and a global human workforce to deliver your processes end-to-end.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Forms Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Forms Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Forms Automation software gives companies the ability to streamline document workflows. These solutions optimize document creation, printing, faxing, merging, security, and inbound/outbound document traffic. Companies can create and manage nearly any kind of document, from invoices to incident reports, and can easily track collected information. Forms Automation software is relevant to most industries and is related to Business Process Management software, Content Management software, Contract Management software, and Document Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Low Code Development Platforms on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Low Code Development Platforms and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Low Code Development Platforms provide users with simplified development environment where application building is achieved with the help of visual elements rather than traditional coding.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Robotic Process Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Robotic Process Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Robotic Process Automation (RPA) helps businesses automate and optimize processes in order to reduce repetitive work and enhance employee productivity.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Workflow Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Workflow Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Workflow Management software coordinates the flow of work and ensures changes are properly implemented. Workflow Management systems offer a collaborative environment that allows businesses to easily monitor and evaluate their processes. Organizations use Workflow Management systems to coordinate their business environment, facilitate instant access to accurate and up-to-date data on projects and performance, schedule and synchronize changes and test the effectiveness of business strategies. Workflow Management software is related to Business Process Management software, Requirements Management software, and Project Management software.
